titleStmt.title: A word in season. Or Three great duties of Christians in the worst of times viz. abiding in Christ, thirsting after his institutions, and submission to his providences. The first opened, from 1 John 2.28. The second from Psal. 42.1,2. The third from Jer. 14.19. By a servant of Christs in the work of his Gospel. To which is added, by way of appendix, the advice of some ministers to their people for the reviving the power and practice of godliness in their families.
titleStmt.author: Servant of Christ in the work of his Gospel.

notesStmt.note: "An appendix to the foregoing discourses" has separate dated title plage; pagination and register are continuous.
